overview: A family from Maranhão who lives in São Paulo finds a way to maintain themselves in the pandemic period, undertaking homemade bread. In the midst of so many uncertainties, the individual difficulties and achievements of each person in this family are reported. From humble origins and eager to grow, they find strength and willingness to move forward, having to face new challenges in the big city, in search of job opportunities and better living conditions. The trajectory of a simple family, but full of values and experiences to tell.
title: Além dos Pães
